actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to provide that there will be a cost-of-living increase in social security and SSI benefits for 1985 without regard to whether the three percent threshold is met.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that there will be a cost- of-living increase in benefits under Titles II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) and XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act for 1985 without regard to whether the three percent threshold is met.

titles.title: A bill to provide that there will be a cost-of-living increase in social security and SSI benefits for 1985 without regard to whether the three percent threshold is met.
